summary: The document, a dispatch under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, addresses the status of LIENVOY-8 within the LIERVOY Project. Contrary to initial beliefs, LIENVOY-8 was not terminated and remained part of the project. The dispatch calls for an update on LIENVOY-8's current status, including whether he is still active or has been terminated, and requests an evaluation of his reliability and any security concerns based on his 1960 activities and reputation.
key_findings: LIENVOY-8 was mistakenly thought to have been terminated from the LIERVOY Project.
No Agent Service Record or termination report for LIENVOY-8 was found in his file.
LIENVOY-8's involvement in the project varied, as indicated by his inclusion in some but not all project renewal requests.
The document seeks to clarify LIENVOY-8's current status and assess his reliability and any potential security concerns.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act
